content: I would like to contribute to Number Theory by working on formalizing Chebyshev Functions. As I can see, defining them is feasible. Is there any ongoing work on it, or maybe you have any suggestions or words of caution against this idea?
Do you mean docs#Polynomial.Chebyshev.T and the other declarations in that file?
Or https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chebyshev_function ? Looks like something PNT+ might have
Yes, I meant Chebyshev functions that go around PNT theorem. Alex Kontorovich PNT repo have exactly what I need, thanks.
